cause.description:
On September 8th, Cosmetic and Sedation Dentistry will be hosting "Dentistry With a Heart". It's simple. . . for one day only, we will be offering extractions, fillings, and cleanings for FREE to people that simply cannot afford dental care. Our services will be limited to one procedure per person, so that we may help as many people in our community as possible!!! It will be held from 7AM - 4PM at the following location:
2100 Riverside Prkwy Suite 130 Lawrenceville, GA 30043
If you are interested in volunteering, or need more information, please visit us at dentalheart.com .
1. Quality dental care should be available to those in need, and cannot afford it.
cause.mission: To provide quality dental care free of charge for the needy on September 8th, 2007, and one day anually thereafter!
cause.name: Dentistry With a Heart
